results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = A083093 with 1's and 2's interchanged.
link: Y. Moshe, The density of 0's in recurrence double sequences, J. Number Theory, 103 (2003), 109-121; see Fig. 1.
Y. Moshe, The distribution of elements in automatic double sequences, Discr. Math., 297 (2005), 91-103.
formula: The negative of Pascal's triangle read mod 3.
mathematica: -Mod[ Flatten[ Table[ Binomial[n, k], {n, 0, 13}, {k, 0, n}]], -3] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 19 2004 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 19 2004
